issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
backgroundLeftCap and backgroundRightCap has no effect. Image in button is still stretched. Test code to create button:

var btn = Ti.UI.createButton({
              title:'text',
              height:40,
              bottom: 10,
              right: 10,
              width:120,    
              backgroundColor: 'blue',      
              backgroundImage: 'ks_nav_ui.png',
              font: { fontSize: 15, fontWeight: 'bold', },
              backgroundLeftCap:10,
              backgroundTopCap:5
       });
fields.summary: backgroundLeftCap and backgroundTopCap dont work on Android

comments.body:
Unfortunately this is a fundamental platform difference, for Android you'll need to create a 9 patch PNG:
http://developer.android.com/guide/developing/tools/draw9patch.html
